title: Visual Learning Path for Illustration and 3D Modeling
description: This personalized learning path is designed for beginners with a visual learning style who want to explore the world of illustration and 3D modeling. The path will cover foundational concepts and skills in both areas, allowing you to create stunning visual artworks and models.

milestones.title: Introduction to Digital Illustration
milestones.description: Learn about digital illustration tools, basic drawing techniques, and color theory.

resources.title: Digital Art Basics: Introduction to Procreate
resources.description: Video tutorial on using Procreate for digital art creation.

resources.title: Color Theory for Beginners
resources.description: Interactive guide to understanding color relationships.

milestones.title: Introduction to 3D Modeling
milestones.description: Explore the basics of 3D modeling software, polygon modeling, and texturing.

resources.title: Blender Beginner Tutorial Series
resources.description: Step-by-step tutorials for learning Blender basics.

resources.title: Understanding Polygon Modeling
resources.description: Visual guide to polygon modeling techniques.

milestones.title: Creating Illustrative Scenes in 3D
milestones.description: Combine illustration principles with 3D modeling to create visually appealing scenes.

resources.title: Fusion of 2D Illustration and 3D Modeling
resources.description: Tutorial on integrating 2D and 3D elements for illustrations.

resources.title: Texturing and Lighting in 3D
resources.description: Visual guide to enhancing 3D scenes with textures and lighting.
